channel.title: How do i ban cats ! ::cats! how do i ban?!?!?!
channel.description: some prick is messing up my server with ::cat i really wanna know how to ban them!?!?!? please help me?¬!

item.title: How do i ban cats ! ::cats! how do i ban?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @mooseguy00 mooseguy00
item.description:
@mooseguy00 wrote:

ok "cat" client.java and delete everything that cat has and there you go its gone[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 10:03:00 PM[/size][hr]that or you can change to a item command

item.title: How do i ban cats ! ::cats! how do i ban?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

There’s a tutorial on this. Just do what udluv said to do though, and make sure people know that using it isn’t welcome. Of course, if you deleted/commented the command out and compiled but nothing happened, either the command is still there somewhere else (a duplicate for some stupid reason), or your compiler isn’t working.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i ban cats ! ::cats! how do i ban?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

r0ssc03:

plz ask this in the tuts section lol u will get more help or look in the tuts u will find it simple and easy 2 do =-)

Why are u telling him to ask it in the tut section? The tut section if for people posting tuts not questions. This is where he should of posted it.

Ill help you replace your old code with this.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cat")) { appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

item.dc:creator: @grungy grungy
item.description:
@grungy wrote:

/*else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cat")) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(765, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; }*\

quote it out and if you have delted that search for (“cat”) again and quote out anything todo with cat’s. You should always quote out, then compile, if it still works then delte what you quoted out. this way you dont need to backup every time you change.

item.description:

it says cannot find “cats”… nor cats… so what now???[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 02:00:43 PM[/size][hr]i’ve searched “cat” and this is wat it says…
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cat”)) {
server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(765, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
summonedNPCS++;
actionTimer = 20;
}

is this it or not… i tried to delete… compile-runserver… log in mopar… and ::cat… stil wasn’t deleted
